name: Puck off (Jaskowicz, NathanJam)
description:
Puck Off is a 2 player (same keyboard) competitive Air Hockey battle game, featuring a myriad of power-ups!

You can also change these powerups in a configuration file! This is located at C:\Users\<USERNAME>\AppData\LocalLow\Team Strike\Puck Off\Powerups

So, what are you waiting for? Fight your friends and family to an awesome game of Air Hockey, the first to 7 goals wins!

This game was made in 3 weeks for a university project. All art assets were created by Nathan Sherris. All Music in this game is from Epidemic Sounds. All Programming was done by the rest of the team (listed in the credits of the game)
